group_1.textLeft: What should we do...?

group_1.textRight: None of these have that "it" factor...

group_1.textLeft: Hello, everyooone!
Hello, Sayuki!
And hello to Mayu and Ria as well!

group_1.textRight: There you are, Sayu-Sayu...and your friends, too?@Ha, I feel like I'm in the way.

group_1.textLeft: Hey, Mr. Producer! Thank you sooo much@for all your help!

group_1.textRight: Mr. Producer?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, he's been helping out a lot with@"Sayu-Slice."

group_1.textRight: "Sayu-Slice?" As in, "Sayu-Sayu's Slice-n-Dice@Mizuna Travelogue?"
I didn't think it'd be nicknamed like THAT...

group_1.textLeft: So what happened today?

group_1.textRight: We were just having a meeting about our@next project...

group_1.textLeft: We've run into some difficulties.

group_1.textRight: Oh no, I didn't realize how badly we were@imposing! Please excuse us!
Right, we'll take our leave. These are important@matters you're dealing with.

group_1.textLeft: No, actually, we'd be grateful if you two@could stay.
People your age have a knack for thinking outside@the box. I think hearing what you have to say would@be really beneficial.
As you may already know, "Sayu-Slice" is@an online video series...
...that was intended to breathe new life into@Mizuna Ward's community.
This specific episode has grown into something@more special, however.

group_1.textRight: Special? How so?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:303301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Since it's summer, we'll be doing a special bonus@feature: a treasure hunt on a deserted island!
As part of the show, I'll get to wear the special@swimsuit...
...the two of you helped me make!
That was our intention, yes...but we had@to cancel it.

group_1.textRight: That's right! We canceled it!!!
...Wait, canceled? But why?!

group_1.textLeft: Mosquitoes.

group_1.textRight: Pardon?

group_1.textLeft: Mosquitoes.
The cave we were going to hide the treasure in@turned out to be positively swarming with them.
What's more, the production staff got...@carried away, to say the least.
They made absurdly deep pitfalls, and traps@that sent people flying.
The only way you could reach the cave to begin with was by swimming through a secret underground channel.
...Needless to say, I had my objections.

group_1.textRight: Why on earth would they want to put an idol@through that?!

group_1.textLeft: Um...I feel like Sayuki could pull it off, though...

group_1.textRight: That's...well...
[chara:301001:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]...That's beside the point!

group_1.textLeft: It certainly went way over the line.
We've disciplined the staff members@involved for their recklessness.
It's all the same, though - the island treasure@hunt's been called off.
Make no mistake, we'll still be doing a special@summer project.
That is...if we can come up with any ideas, first.
I've been wanting to ask Sayuki for her input,
and the fact you both came as well is a@very happy coincidence.
If it's alright with you, can you weigh in@with your opinions?

group_1.textRight: Oh, sure...! I'll probably be about as helpful@as those mosquitoes, though...
Indeed I will. I certainly can't say no to@someone who needs my help.
Now, when you say "summer special," what@exactly do you have in mind?

group_1.textLeft: At the moment, we've been trying to incorporate@both swimsuits and Mizuna in our project.
And...
We'd also like to feature the treasure we'd prepared@for the hunt: a sword forged by none other than the swordsmith Kamigiri.

group_1.textRight: [chara:303301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]*Gasp*
A s-s-s-sword by THE Kamigiri?!

group_1.textLeft: We had it commissioned just for this occasion.

group_1.textRight: I didn't - I had no idea… Why didn't anyone@tell me?!

group_1.textLeft: I wanted it to be a fun surprise for you@when you opened the treasure chest.
If you'd successfully completed those challenges,@it would have been your reward.
And if you couldn't manage it, we would@have donated it to the local museum.

group_1.textRight: Hawa...hawawawawa…@B-but...what will happen to it now?

group_1.textLeft: That depends on the plan we end up choosing.
The sword was intended to serve as a piece of@treasure.
My ideal solution would have the sword@involved in a way...
...so it retains its role as a prize.

group_1.textRight: Then...if we come up with just the right plan,@I can earn Kamigiri's sword...
I have to think carefully...

group_1.textLeft: We've thought about it, but haven't@settled on anything...
How about you two?

group_1.textRight: Having considered all your desires, I've put@together a flawless solution!
